website_summaries.verdict: The EasyShare C875 is a fine choice for anyone who wants solid photos and broad control.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. It worked for about 5 minutes and then it was dead. It would not come on and stay on. I;ve had similar cameras before so I was familiar with its operation but this one turned out to be a lemon. After taking it to a wedding and having the thing crap out completely, it went right in the garbage. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Pajauis

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has already quit working. We've changed batteries on it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Muecke

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from this person
customer_reviews.text: New batteries and nothing. I got taken for my money. I owned one of these cameras before and it worked. Never buy from this person. I am so sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy26

customer_reviews.title: Kodak C875 8MP digital camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little "take along" point & shoot camera. The good: let the camera do the thinking and nearly every shot you take will be great. Want to control the shutter or lens opening you can do that too. With its included softwear and website support you can make the most of every shot you take. The bad: no optical viewfinder & no optional add-ons to enhance picture taking ability. What you see is what you get! For anyone like me who doesn't care about all the bells & whistles but just want's easy to make great pix in most situations, this camera would be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: D. Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for under $200
customer_reviews.text: LCD display is big, regardless the lack of a viewfinder (which many mentioned as a battery drainer) battery duration is very good, and color is excellent. All that aside, this camera has every feature a casual user might want. For me, I take HQ photos of products for data sheets and its F number of up to 8 has given me a very decent depth of field on macro mode for these shots. Other great features are its 8mp and 5x optical zoom which makes it even more versatile. Overall this camera is outstanding for its low price.
customer_reviews.author: Neomass

customer_reviews.title: Flashy Remarks
customer_reviews.text: Overall we are happy with this camera (our first digital). It's easy to use, the photos are sharp and the color is vibrant. The reviewer who stated that photos look better when you use the specific lighting/action settings was absolutely right, which can be frustrating when you want to just point and shoot. I also wish I had realized that the batteries have a very limited life in this camera, even when you buy the lithium. We bought rechargable AA's for digital cameras and that took care of that problem for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Littleton

customer_reviews.title: Good little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons trip and he loves it. It takes a while to learn. When we bought it there was no cd or instructions with it, although I believed there would be. I was disappointed at first but like it overall. The two things I do not like are 1. It can only take a 2 Gigabyte card max. @. You have to reset the date every time when you change the batteries. Its not hard to do but does get old. It was very inexpensive, and overall a good little camera.
customer_reviews.author: freebirdandfloyd

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Heavy and Clunky for My Tastes
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of use of this camera, but there are other cameras that do the same thing, and are far more portable than this one. If you don't mind the bulk, it's a good camera especially for beginners But in this age of portable everything, from phones, (that, by the way take very good pictures), to cameras, this one just seems like a clunky blast from the past.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia Fore

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this one. I had a Kodak 4 mp for a long time and it took beautiful pictures. I purchased the Kodak 7 mp and I hated it from the start. I returned it and then bought this 8 mp. What a difference!!! I thought I would have a problem with it not having a standard viewfinder but the technology has really improved on the LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mc

customer_reviews.title: Could be a great camera, but VERY DISAPPOINTING in low light.
customer_reviews.text: This was my third digital camera, and the features, price and other reviews made me curious. The bottom line about this camera is that when shooting indoors and overcast sky, the flash is seriously underpowered. The 5x zoom lens lets you get close, but beyond 8 feet the picture is dark and disappointing. Amazon paid the return shipping, and the credit was smooth, thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Wagner

customer_reviews.title: kodak c875
customer_reviews.text: I already had a C875 and wanted another to make stereo (3D) pictures with. I take 2 pictures at one time and mount them to have a 3-D picure. It works great. It's a little hard on batteries but I already knew that. The purchase of an AC adapter has helped that though when I use it for reviewing pictures etc.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: No view finder
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had researched this camera a little more before I bought it. When I received it I found out it has no view finder, only the screen on the back to view what you are taking a picture of. For younger people who didn't grow up using 35mm range finder and SLR camera's I am sure they won't mind. It does take great pictures and it is easy to use but because there is no view finder I put the camera in the back of my sock drawer and bought a Canon A630 which I really enjoy using.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H.

customer_reviews.title: Lousy
customer_reviews.text: Turned out not to work. Won't accept a memory card. Intwrnal memory VERY small. No dock for sharing. Seller did not refund.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: a camera anyone can use and get great results!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this camera. It took me a few minutes to adjust to not having a viewfinder. After the adjustment, I love the way you can see the photo on the large screen in advance of shooting it and really make sure you have it centered properly. The batteries are the only negative issue. They didn't last but a few hours. I was very disappointed by this, especially when I had to leave an event to get fresh batteries.
customer_reviews.author: D. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: We looked up this camera on a rating site before we purchased it, and it's turned out to live up to our expectations. It has numerous settings that allow you to take pictures in every situation, and takes wonderful pictures. I would recommend this camera for anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Flash gone bust
customer_reviews.text: Just after two years of use, the flash is gone bust. It is no use to get it repaired as you can get a canon powershot for less than the cost of repair. So no more KODAK products for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Kaw

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It does more than I have needed to do so far. It's easy to operate and takes great pictures. I haven't used it for video or panoramic shots other than to try out the options but they worked great when I tested them. I would recommend this camera as an easy camera to work with.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My Kodak Easyshare
customer_reviews.text: My old Kodak Easyshare was ruined by Shamu splashing it at Universal studios in Florida (don't sit up front!). I found another one on Amazon and purchased it. Everything went smoothly and the camera came even before the promised date. It works just as good as my old one and I'm very pleased with how easy everything went. Kudos to the seller and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a cannon to this, and I love this camera. Out of the box, easy to use, nice pics. I have bought two other Kodaks as gifts, same easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: ... and expectations this is my 2nd Kodak Easyshare camera love it!
customer_reviews.text: It meets all my requirements and expectations this is my 2nd Kodak Easyshare camera love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: brenda lawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: 8 MP and 5X optical zoom for $171 including a 1GB memory card......quite a good deal. The C875 is a bit front heavy with the large zoom lens and the auto focus occasionally locks on something in the foreground and captures the subject out of focus. Easy to operate and great photos when properly focused. Camera size allows for convenient in-pocket carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesguy

customer_reviews.title: The Kodak that could
customer_reviews.text: I have been a photographer for many years. i can set f -stops and use a light meter and everything. But this little digital makes me wonder why I waited so long to go digital.I love my new Kodak. It is gets nice results in the very beginning. Of course you can go on to more complicated shots when you are ready. It is very easy to use and gets lovely pics.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Bowne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchse
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and the picture quality is sharp and very good so far. I tried video recording with 2GB sd card which I purchased it together and it worked excellent so far. I recommend this to anyone. And the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabaw H. Lat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera looks great, works great and arrived two days before first day of the estimated delivery. Very Happy! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: karen whaley

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Made a great gift but now we are having problems formatting a memory card to it. Arrived ontime just a little bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a good camera if it wasn't for it's inability to start on a regular basis and the battery draining issue. Its junk because of too many bugs. Stay away from it.
customer_reviews.author: HG#28

customer_reviews.title: digital camera
customer_reviews.text: For the price, an excellent camera. Anti-shake would be the only improvement for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: El Grillo

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this camera is my first, but i have borrowed all of my families and friends cameras and mine is the best. i definately recommend this camera to anyone. its easy to use and fun.
customer_reviews.author: precious girl

customer_reviews.title: Happy Photos
customer_reviews.text: Had the Kodak EasyShare C875 highly recommended. Purchased and am so happy with easy use of camera and support from Kodak. I would also recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for a new camera.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Regan

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Easy to use. Fantastic zoom. Good software transfer. Overall excellent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Kodak C875
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great features packed into the C875. I am very pleased to have such a nice camera in this small package.
customer_reviews.author: Helmut L. Seufert

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2007
customer_reviews.text: Decent camera .. I guess good for the price. I would invest more and buy a better model to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mireya Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Kodak C875 Camera
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera! It is very easy to use and has LOTS of great features! It takes great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Camera Came from Amazon Broken
customer_reviews.text: Well, I did not even had a chance to use it.. When I turned it on it immediatly turned off.. I returned it to AMAZON and I am waiting my refund. I am dissapointed with it...
customer_reviews.author: Djalma Pinto de Britto

product_meta.title: Kodak Easyshare C875 8 MP Digital Camera with 5xOptical Zoom (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description: Take excellent shots with this easy-to-use Kodak EasyShare C875 8.0 MPdigital camera . With 8.0 MP you can crop and enlarge, and still have great image quality and youcan make stunning prints up to 30x 40 inches. Its all-glass SCHNEIDER-KREUZNACH VARIOGON lens delivers remarkable precision and sharpness. Zero in on your subjects with 5x optical zoom and get even closer with 5x digital zoom ! Some days you just want to point and shoot. Other days you want to be more creative. With this Kodak EasyShare C875 , you get it all, from smart scene mode to manual controls. And always with a whole lot of ease! This C875 digital camera is part of the KODAK EASYSHARE System, so sharing your pictures is amazingly simple. Just press Share! With this Kodak EasyShare C875 digital camera you're ready to go right out of the box! Order today!
feature_bullets: 8-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
Program, aperture- and shutter-priority, and manual modes for extra creativity
Records TV-quality VGA video at 30 frames per second, with MPEG-4 compression
Stores images on SD memory cards (32MB internal memory included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars150 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
